plugins\/ttscast\/desktop\/js\/ttscast.j.Mode SCAN actif pendant 60 secondes. (Cl: SCAN mode active for 60 seconds. (Click STOP SCAN to stop device discovery)

plugins\/ttscast\/desktop\/php\/ttscast..Aucun équipement ttscast trouvé, cliquer: No TTSCast equipment found, click Scan to start

plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Version de PyEnv utilisée par le Plugin: PyEnv Version used by the Plugin (To give on Community)
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Version de Python utilisée par le Plugin: Python Version used by the Plugin (To give on Community)
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Le démon devra être redémarré après la m: The daemon will have to be restarted after changing this setting
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.[ATTENTION] Ne changez ce paramètre qu'e: [ATTENTION] Only change this setting if necessary. (Default = 55111)
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Moteur TTS à utiliser pour la synthèse v: TTS engine to use for speech synthesis
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Langue à utiliser avec l'API Google Tran: Language to use with the Google Translate or Jeedom TTS API (It is not possible to choose a voice, only a language)
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Rentrer votre clé API Voice RSS, récupér: Enter your Voice RSS API key, recoverable on their site, in your profile
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Uploader votre clé JSON en utilisant le: Upload your JSON key using the 'Add Key (JSON)' button
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Langue et Voix à utiliser avec le moteur: Language and Voice for use with the Voice RSS TTS engine
Language and Voice for use with the Google Cloud TTS engine
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Ce paramètre est utilisé uniquement pour: This setting is used only for speech synthesis (TTS) testing
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Sauvegardez bien votre configuration AVA: Save your configuration BEFORE using the button (GENERATE + BROADCAST)
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Ex: Ceci est un message de test pour la: Ex: This is a test message for speech synthesis from Jeedom.
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Utilise l'URL externe de Jeedom pour la: Use the Jeedom external URL for reading TTS files rather than the internal URL (Recommended = unchecked)
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Génère les fichiers TTS à chaque demande: Generates TTS files on each request. It is strongly recommended that you do NOT check this box, except for testing purposes.
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Le cache des fichiers TTS générés sera p: The cache of generated TTS files will be purged automatically every X (0 to 90) days via the daily cron
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Désactive (globalement) le 'ding' au lan: Disables (globally) the 'ding' when launching a command on a Google Home
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Met à jour la liste des radios de vos éq: Update the list of radios for each equipment. WARNING: this may have an impact on your scenarios!
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Met à jour la liste des custom radios de: Update the list of custom radios for each equipment. WARNING: this may have an impact on your scenarios!
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Met à jour la liste des sons (.mp3). ATT: Update the list of sounds (.mp3). WARNING: this may have an impact on your scenarios!
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Met à jour la liste des sons personnalis: Update the list of custom sounds (.mp3). WARNING: this may have an impact on your scenarios!
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Upload un fichier (.mp3) pour l'ajouter: Upload a file (.mp3) to add it to the Custom Sounds directory
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Upload d'un fichier (.json) pour mettre: Upload a file (.json) to update the list of Custom Radios
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Demande de purge du cache envoyée (voir: Request to purge cache :: Sent (See daemon logs for result)
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Demande de mise à jour des listes :: Rad: Request to update lists :: Radios :: Sent (See ttscast logs for result)
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Demande de mise à jour des listes :: Cus: Request to update lists :: CustomRadios :: Sent (See ttscast logs for result)
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Demande de mise à jour des listes :: Sou: Request to update lists :: Sounds :: Sent (See ttscast logs for result)
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Demande de mise à jour des listes :: Cus: Request to update lists :: Custom Sounds :: Sent (See ttscast logs for result)
plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/configura.Demande de génération du TTS de test env: Request to generate test TTS :: Sent (See daemon logs for result)

plugins\/ttscast\/plugin_info\/install.p.Une erreur est survenue à la mise à jour: An error occurred during automatic update of dependencies. Check logs and restart dependencies manually
